name: Log4Shell
description: Remote Code Execution via JNDI injection in Apache Log4j library.

name: SQL Injection
description: Insertion of SQL queries via input data from client to application.
mitigation: Use Parameterized Queries (Prepared Statements). Enforce Least Privilege.

name: Path Traversal
description: Access to files and directories outside the web root.
mitigation: Validate file paths. Run service with least privilege.

name: Command Injection
description: Adversaries may abuse command and script interpreters to execute commands.
mitigation: Disable command execution features. Use whitelist validation.
